Singapore Management University" date: "2024-10-11" format: revealjs: width: 1600 height: 900 show-notes: false slide-number: true show-slide-number: all css: styles.css execute: freeze: true editor: visual --- # Content - Demystifying Geospatial Analytics - Motivation of Geospatial Analytics - The Role of Geospatial Analytics - Geospatial Analytics and Social Consciousness ## Demystifying Geospatial Analytics - A **Geographical Information System (GIS)** is a toolkit for creating, managing, analysing, visualising, and sharing data of any kind according to where it's located. ![](img/image1.jpg){fig-align="center" width="121"} ::: {style="font-size: 1.5em; text-align: center"} Geospatial analytics is more than a GIS. ::: ## Demystifying Geospatial Analytics - Geospatial analytics is more than just mapping. ![](img/image2.jpg) ## Motivation of Geospatial Analytics - About 80% of all data maintained by organisations around the world has a location component. ![](img/image3.jpg){fig-align="center"} ::: {style="font-size: 0.65em; text-align: center"} (Source: BusinessWeek Research Services, 2006) ::: ## Motivation of Geospatial Analytics - The explosion in the availability of open geospatial data from both the public and private sectors at national and international levels. ![](img/image4.jpg){fig-align="center"} ## The role of Geospatial Analytics - Uncovering insights not found in statistical graphs and tables. ![](img/image5.jpg) ::: {style="font-size: 0.65em; text-align: center"} Source: [SGSAS - Simple Geo-Spatial Analysis using R Shiny](https://wiki.smu.edu.sg/1920t2isss608/Group11_application) ::: ## The role of Geospatial Analytics - To reveal the untapped property of spatial contiguity in geographic knowledge discovery in databases. ![](img/image6.jpg){fig-align="center"} ::: {style="font-size: 0.65em; text-align: center"} Source: [SGSAS - Simple Geo-Spatial Analysis using R Shiny](https://wiki.smu.edu.sg/1920t2isss608/Group11_application) ::: ## The role of Geospatial Analytics - To uncover the complexity of the real world relationship. ![](img/image7.jpg){fig-align="center"} ::: {style="font-size: 0.65em; text-align: center"} Source: [SGSAS - Simple Geo-Spatial Analysis using R Shiny](https://wiki.smu.edu.sg/1920t2isss608/Group11_application) ::: ## The role of Geospatial Analytics - To model spatial interactions and flows. ![](img/image8.jpg){fig-align="center"} ::: {style="font-size: 0.65em; text-align: center"} Source: [IS415 Bus Rider Flow Project](https://bus-rider-flow.shinyapps.io/is415-project/) ::: ## Geospatial Analytics and Social Consciousness The true power of geospatial analytics is to provide decision makers and planners with data-driven and process information for better problem solving and more efficient use of resources. ![](img/image9.jpg){fig-align="center" width="1015"} ## Geospatial Analytics for Natural Disaster Management A project done as part of the coursework for [SMT201 Geographic Information Systems for Urban Planning](https://smt201-ay2023-24t1.netlify.app/). ![](img/image10.jpg) Click on this [link](https://smt201-g2-2023.netlify.app/) for more detail. ## Geospatial Analytics for Health ![](img/image11.jpg){width="1200"} Click on this [link](https://is415-geospatial-with-khant.netlify.app/take-home_ex/take-home_ex02/take-home_ex02) for more detail. ## Geospatial Analytics for Landslides Susceptibility Modelling and Mapping ![](img/image12.jpg){width="1200"} Click on this [link](https://is485-whatcauseslandslides.netlify.app/) for more detail. Please visit us at the exhibition booth. ## Geospatial Analytics for Traffic Accident Analysis ![](img/image13.jpg){width="1000"} Click on this [link](https://wecouldgoanywhere.netlify.app/take-home_ex/take-home_ex01/take-home_ex01) for more detail. <script>
  // htmlwidgets need to know to resize themselves when slides are shown/hidden.
  // Fire the "slideenter" event (handled by htmlwidgets.js) when the current
  // slide changes (different for each slide format).
  (function () {
    // dispatch for htmlwidgets
    function fireSlideEnter() {
      const event = window.document.createEvent("Event");
      event.initEvent("slideenter", true, true);
      window.document.dispatchEvent(event);
    }

    function fireSlideChanged(previousSlide, currentSlide) {
      fireSlideEnter();

      // dispatch for shiny
      if (window.jQuery) {
        if (previousSlide) {
          window.jQuery(previousSlide).trigger("hidden");
        }
        if (currentSlide) {
          window.jQuery(currentSlide).trigger("shown");
        }
      }
    }

    // hookup for slidy
    if (window.w3c_slidy) {
      window.w3c_slidy.add_observer(function (slide_num) {
        // slide_num starts at position 1
        fireSlideChanged(null, w3c_slidy.slides[slide_num - 1]);
      });
    }

  })();
</script>
